comment.author: 27070380@N03
comment._content: Very cool where abouts was this located in relation to Stirling itself?
comment.authorname: The Lost Canuck Photography by Cody Kapcsos

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: From what I know about Mennonite settlements in Alberta, there was a small Hutterite group near Stirling that joined the Alberta-Saskatchewan Mennonite Conference in 1949. This was later renamed the Northwest Mennonite Conference. Exactly where this was located in relation to Stirling itself is not described as part of the caption for the photograph. Can you shed more light on this?
